scripts.dev: npm run init-data && npm run kill-port && sleep 1 && nodemon --ignore data/ server.js
scripts.dev-all: npm run init-data && npm run kill-port && sleep 1 && concurrently "nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.debug: npm run init-data && npm run kill-port && sleep 1 && REACT_APP_DEBUG_MODE=true concurrently "nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.prod: npm run init-data && npm run kill-port && sleep 1 && concurrently "nodemon --ignore data/ server.js" "cd client && REACT_APP_DEBUG_MODE=false npm start"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
